name: SettingsRpc
description: A service that queries/modifies driver settings.

functions.name: QueryComponentSettings
functions.description: Queries the settings for a component

functions.name: QueryCurrentValues
functions.description: Queries for the current settings values for a compent

functions.name: QuerySettingsDataHash
functions.description: Getts the setting data hash of the component

functions.name: SetData
functions.description: Sends a setting to the driver

functions.name: GetCurrentValues
functions.description: Queries the current Settings values for all components.
